scripts.start: concurrently "cd uni-helper-backend && npm start" "cd uni-helper-frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.heroku-prebuild: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run clean && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.clean: rimraf uni-helper-backend/public && rimraf uni-helper-backend/dist && rimraf uni-helper-backend/.cache
